extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey

recipes.title: Honey Chipotle Chicken

winePairing.pairingText: Chicken on the menu? Try pairing with Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. The Chehalem INOX Chardonnay with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 13 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Chehalem INOX Chardonnay
productMatches.description: INOX® takes its name from the abbreviation of the French word for stainless steel, inoxydable. The wine was created differently from most Chardonnay you've had. We think we've succeeded in expressing the crisp, steely, and fruit-rich side that we love about some Old-World Chardonnays. What makes this possible is the use of exclusively Dijon clones, exceptionally well suited to Oregon's cool climate and exhibiting a richness that does not depend on oak. INOX screams of the hallmarks of a cool climate-brightness, pinpoint fruit, and explosive aromas and flavors. We intend INOX for a full range of use, from hot weather chilling to elegant dinner complements.Quintessential INOX, with lovely white aromas of gardenia and other flowers, peach, apricot, pear, pineapple, and green apple candy showing on the nose and palate; it shows a great balance with relatively low alcohol for the year and bright acid; the length is lovely and the weight rich, with a supple, silky texture; flavors linger, with cherry and peach accents. Very pleased.

recipes.instructions: Preheat gas or charcoal grill to medium heat. Mix spice (first 4 ingredients) together and sprinkle evenly over both sides of chicken thighs. Rub in with hands. Grill over medium heat about 5 minutes per side. Brush both sides with honey and serve warm. You can remove to platter to brush with honey if easier.

steps.step: Preheat gas or charcoal grill to medium heat.
Mix spice (first 4 ingredients) together and sprinkle evenly over both sides of chicken thighs. Rub in with hands. Grill over medium heat about 5 minutes per side.
Brush both sides with honey and serve warm. You can remove to platter to brush with honey if easier.
